verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: And you are a resident of this land.
verse.verse_3: And by a father and what he fathered.
verse.verse_5: Does he think that no one has power over him?
verse.verse_6: He says, "I have used up so much money."
verse.verse_7: Does he think that no one sees him?
verse.verse_8: Did We not give him two eyes?
verse.verse_9: And a tongue, and two lips?
verse.verse_10: And We showed him the two ways?
verse.verse_11: But he did not brave the ascent.
verse.verse_12: And what will explain to you what the ascent is?
verse.verse_14: Or the feeding on a day of hunger.
verse.verse_16: Or a destitute in the dust.
verse.verse_17: Then he becomes of those who believe, and advise one another to patience, and advise one another to kindness.
verse.verse_18: These are the people of happiness.
verse.verse_19: But as for those who defy Our revelations-these are the people of misery.
verse.verse_20: Upon them is a padlocked Fire.
